
root@freebsd_desktop:~ # cat -n /etc/rc.conf
     1	hostname="freebsd_desktop"
     2	#ifconfig_em0="DHCP"
     3	sshd_enable="YES"
     4	moused_enable="YES"
     5	powerd_enable="YES"
     6	# Set dumpdev to "AUTO" to enable crash dumps, "NO" to disable
     7	dumpdev="AUTO"
     8	dbus_enable="YES"
     9	hald_enable="YES"
    10	gdm_enable="YES"
    11	gnome_enable="YES"
...
    12	ifconfig_em0="inet 172.16.17.148 netmask 255.255.255.0"
    13	defaultrouter="172.16.17.2"
...

root@freebsd_desktop:~ # cat /etc/resolv.conf
# Generated by resolvconf
search localdomain
nameserver 4.2.2.1
root@freebsd_desktop:~ # cat /etc/resolvconf.conf 
# This file was generated by local-unbound-setup.
# Modifications will be overwritten.
#resolv_conf="NO" # prevent updating /etc/resolv.conf
unbound_conf="/var/unbound/forward.conf"
unbound_pid="/var/run/local_unbound.pid"
#unbound_service="local_unbound"
unbound_restart="service local_unbound reload"
root@freebsd_desktop:~ #
